Sie verwenden jedoch die geerbten -Methoden, um den Zugriff auf freigegebene Ressourcen zu blockieren.Classes derived from define a signaling mechanism to indicate taking or releasing access to a shared resource, but they use the inherited methods to block while waiting for access to shared resources.
